task.title: Verify the MariaDB replication data count on geo-redundant SMs and IGs (if required)

taskbody.context: If you have geo-redundant SMs or IGs in your deployment, use this procedure, if required, post recovery, to ensure that the MariaDB replicated data count is the same on both geo-redundant SMs or IGs. If the MariaDB replicated data count is different, MariaDB data has not replicated to this second SM or IG Geo site.

step.cmd: To verify if data is being replicated properly or accomplish MariaDB data replication on the second SM or IG Geo site when it is not, perform the “Checking replicated data count on geo-redundant SM or IG sites” procedure that is available from the NCC Installation and Upgrade Guide.
